00003 ospf_nbr        *
00004 ospf_getnbr(ospf_state * state, int id)
00005 {
00006         int      i;
00007 
00008         for(i = 0; i < state->n_interfaces; i++)
00009                 if(state->nbr[i].id == id)
00010                         return &state->nbr[i];
00011 
00012         //tw_error(TW_LOC, "Unable to find neighbor!");
00013 
00014         return NULL;
00015 }

00017 void
00018 neighbor_init(ospf_state * state, ospf_nbr * nbr, tw_lp * lp)
00019 {
00020         rn_link         *l;
00021 
00022         nbr->router = state;
00023         nbr->id = nbr->m->id;
00024 
00025         nbr->state = ospf_nbr_full_st;
00026         nbr->istate = ospf_int_point_to_point_st;
00027         nbr->ltype = ospf_link_point_to_point;
00028         nbr->dd_seqnum = 0;
00029 
00030         if(nbr->m->type != c_router)
00031                 return;
00032 
00033         l = rn_getlink(state->m, nbr->id);
00034 
00035 /*
00036         if(!l->cost)
00037                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "%ld: link to %d has not cost! \n", lp->id, l->addr);
00038 */
00039 
00040         nbr->hello_interval = g_ospf_state->hello_sendnext;
00041         nbr->router_dead_interval = g_ospf_state->poll_interval;
00042 
00043         if(nbr->router_dead_interval < (l->delay * .15))
00044                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Link delay too large for this router "
00045                         "dead interval (%f > %f)!",
00046                         l->delay, nbr->router_dead_interval);
00047 
00048         nbr->hello = (ospf_hello *) calloc(sizeof(ospf_hello) + 
00049                                         (sizeof(unsigned int) * state->n_interfaces), 1);
00050 
00051         if(!nbr->hello)
00052                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Out of memory!");
00053 
00054         nbr->hello->neighbors = (unsigned int *) (((char *) nbr->hello) + sizeof(ospf_hello));
00055         nbr->requests = (char *) calloc(state->ar->g_ospf_nlsa, 1);
00056 
00057         if(!nbr->requests)
00058                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Out of memory!");
00059 
00060         if(nbr->ar->as != state->ar->as)
00061                 return;
00062 
00063         if(rn_getmachine(nbr->id)->type == c_router)
00064         {
00065                 nbr->hello_timer = NULL;
00066 
00067                 nbr->hello_timer = ospf_timer_start(nbr, nbr->hello_timer,
00068                                                     nbr->hello_interval,
00069                                                     OSPF_HELLO_SEND, lp);
00070 
00071                 nbr->inactivity_timer = ospf_timer_start(nbr, nbr->inactivity_timer,
00072                                                  nbr->router_dead_interval,
00073                                                  OSPF_HELLO_TIMEOUT,
00074                                                  lp);
00075         }
00076 }
00077 
00078         /*
00079          * Setup the neighbor data structures
00080          */
00081 void
00082 ospf_neighbor_init(ospf_state * state, tw_lp * lp)
00083 {
00084         int              i;
00085 
00086         for(i = 0; i < state->n_interfaces; i++)
00087                 neighbor_init(state, &state->nbr[i], lp);
00088 }
00089 
00090 /*
00091  * THIS FUNCTION SHOULD NOT BE USED IN SIMULATION, ONLY IN INIT!!
00092  */
00093 ospf_nbr *
00094 ospf_get_neighbor(ospf_state * state, int id)
00095 {
00096         int i;
00097 
00098         for(i = 0; i < state->n_interfaces; i++)
00099                 if(id == state->nbr[i].id)
00100                         return &state->nbr[i];
00101 
00102         tw_error(TW_LOC, "Unable to find neighbor %d!!", id);
00103 
00104         return NULL;
00105 }
